info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued December 25 at 2:35PM MST until December 27 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TUESDAY TO 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations 2 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Byers and points eastward, including I-70 through Deer Trail and Limon. * WHEN...From 2 AM Tuesday to 5 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Visibilities may drop below 1/4 mile due to falling and blowing snow. Plan on sharply reduced visibility and difficult if not treacherous driving conditions. Road closures will be possible.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions for Colorado can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by going to www.cotrip.org.
